name: paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelect:handler:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationViewController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, 
                                       didSelect paymentMethod: PKPaymentMethod, 
                                         handler completion: @escaping (PKPaymentRequestPaymentMethodUpdate) -> Void)
